title: Aaron Carter reveals he's moving to Canada in early morning Twitter rant after bowing face tattoo
text:
He's really not happy in the U.S.

In fact, Aaron Carter took to Twitter on Saturday morning to reveal to his fans that he's moving to Canada after playing in Halifax, Nova Scotia the night before.

And the 31-year-old shared a clip of Bugs Bunny cutting America off from the Great White North on a map to make his point.

Starting a new life: Aaron Carter, who played in Halifax, Nova Scotia on Friday, took to Twitter on Saturday morning to reveal to his fans that he's moving to Canada

The I Want Candy singer added: 'ok guys I have a BIG announcement. I Found my new home and I'm starting the process on buying this home tomorrow.'

Quirky as ever, he added: '#WeAreTheNorth I'm in the North Pole now! you can't find me now! #GoodByeAmerica #NorthWestTerritories.'

A couple of hours later, Aaron tweeted that he was ready to drive to the property.

'So I'm about to get a rental car and drive a few hours to go see my new home, I'm move fast.

Making his point: The 31-year-old former Backstreet Boy shared a gif of Bugs Bunny cutting Canada away from the U.S.

Future life: The pop star called America 'really foul' in this tweet

'My Brother in law Mike lives here and my niece Alyssa so I have family here and Nova Scotia is one of my FAVORITE PLACES IN THE WORLd! Plus it makes for shorter flights for Europe tour.'

But Aaron did have a moment of doubt, tweeting an hour later: 'I hope Canada welcomes me and doesn't treat me the way people do in America it's really foul I had to get out and I moved quick. Pun intended.'

Whether or not the former Backstreet Boy will actually move is a matter of speculation. His mental health has been in question for a while.

Sharing his new ink: This comes a week after Aaron got a huge face tattoo of Rihanna as Medusa from her album cover.

Getting out there: Aaron put in an appearance on Instagram live on Friday

This comes a week after Aaron got a huge face tattoo of Rihanna as Medusa from her album cover.

Meanwhile his twin sister Angel and brother Nick filed a restraining order against the singer amid claims that Aaron intended to kill him, his wife Lauren Kitt and their unborn child.

'In light of Aaron's increasingly alarming behavior and his recent confession that he harbors thoughts and intentions of killing my pregnant wife and unborn child, we were left with no choice but to take every measure possible to protect ourselves and our family,' Nick tweeted.

Nick and Lauren's baby girl was born on October 2 and Aaron subsequently apologized for his behavior.
description: the 31-year-old singer shared a clip of Bugs Bunny cutting America off from the Great White North on a map to make his point on Saturday. He tweeted, ' I'm in the North Pole now!'
